description:
With his new abilities, Vegeta quickly tracks down and forcefully acquires another Dragon Ball.  Now, there is only one magic orb left to find, and Dende knows who has it - the Eldest Namekian!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Os grandes lutadores se reúnem com o Sr. Kaio!
Yuuki Hyakubai! Kaiou no Moto ni Shuuketsu Suru Senshi-tachi
ความกล้า 100 เท่า! คอร์สติวเข้มของท่านเจ้าพิภพ
勇気百倍! 界王の下に集結する戦士たち
